suggestions.original: To improve the line combination in the artwork, consider adding more detailed and cohesive line work in the background. This will help to enhance the overall visual harmony and balance the composition. Additionally, refining the lines around the characters and objects can create a more polished and dynamic scene. Pay attention to the interaction between the lines to ensure they contribute to the overall flow and movement of the artwork.
